explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the effect of mandatory financial disclosures (SFAS 131) on corporate restructuring activities, using difference-in-differences (DiD) and regression discontinuity design (RDD) methods. It does not involve any machine learning techniques, neural networks, or related methodologies mentioned in the keyword list. The study is purely in the domain of financial economics and corporate governance, with no relevance to the provided AI/ML keywords.
